pkgmetadata.longdescription: Objective Bayesian Analysis for Spatial Regression Models // It makes an objective Bayesian analysis of the spatial regression model using both the normal (NSR) and student-T (TSR) distributions. The functions provided give prior and posterior objective densities and allow default Bayesian estimation of the model regression parameters. Details can be found in Ordonez et al. (2020) arXiv:2004.04341.
